name: RenderWare Model File
summary: Learn about .DFF files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You will most likely only encounter DFF files if you are a GTA3 gamer looking to modify the appearance of players and vehicles in the game.

DFF files are organized into multiple sections that describe the geometry and materials that compose the model. Sections in the DFF file include texture, reflection material, model skins, the behavior of breakable objects, and specular lighting material.
NOTE: While DFF files store models for GTA3 games, textures are saved in .TXD archives and animations are stored in .ANM animation files.

instructions: You can open DFF files with Zanoza ZModeler (Windows) to alter RenderWare models. You can also open DFF files with Blender, but you must also have the DragonFF plugin installed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
